start.speaker: Genevieve
start.text: Welcome, dear. I'm Genevieve Lynch. You must be the young woman looking for her uncle.

choices.text: Yes, Cornelius Buckley. Have you seen him?
What do you think of your husband's cave venture?
Has a man named Powell contacted you?
Just saying hello. I should go.

about_cornelius.speaker: Genevieve
about_cornelius.text: Mr. Buckley? Yes, he stayed with us for a few days. A charming man, if a bit obsessed with his research.

cornelius_concerns.speaker: Genevieve
cornelius_concerns.text: I was worried about him, actually. He would disappear into the cave for hours at a time. William said he was just thorough, but...

cornelius_warning.speaker: Genevieve
cornelius_warning.text: The night before he disappeared, he seemed frightened. Said he'd found something that 'certain people wouldn't want known.' He asked if we had a safe place to hide documents.

where_hidden.speaker: Genevieve
where_hidden.text: William suggested the Liberty Bell formation in the cave — there's a hidden alcove behind it. Mr. Buckley seemed pleased with that idea.

about_venture.speaker: Genevieve
about_venture.text: William's dream? I support him, of course. He sees such potential in this place. A tourist attraction, he says. People coming from all over to see the wonders underground.

venture_doubts.speaker: Genevieve
venture_doubts.text: I just worry about the investment. We put everything we had into buying this property. If it doesn't work out...

about_powell.speaker: Genevieve
about_powell.text: Powell? Oh yes, he's been here twice already. Trying to buy the mineral rights from William. Offering quite a lot of money.

powell_opinion.speaker: Genevieve
powell_opinion.text: I don't trust him. He's too smooth, if you know what I mean. I told William to be careful, but he's so eager to make connections...

choices.text: Powell is running a fraud. You should tell William.
Your instincts are right. Be careful.

warning_received.speaker: Genevieve
warning_received.text: A fraud? I knew it! That man's smile never reached his eyes. But William won't listen to suspicions — he'll need proof.

appreciates.speaker: Genevieve
appreciates.text: Thank you. It's good to know I'm not being paranoid. I'll keep an eye on things.

farewell.speaker: Genevieve
farewell.text: Take care, dear. And I hope you find your uncle.
